item.title: Comparing two JSONs with float values in Python
item.description: JSON objects are often used while we write programs. I will introduce the way to compare two JSONs with float values for approximate equality in Python.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! I’m Kido Naoto. I work for a data analytics company ARISE analytics as a software/data engineer in Tokyo. I like to write software and learn new technology. I intend to make this page more colorful, but for now, see my LinkedIn profile for more details.
